sql.command: select a.account_id, a.account_head, a.account_code, a.account_type_id from ( Select -99 as account_id, 'All' as account_head, '' as account_code, -1 as account_type_id union All (select account_id, account_head, account_code, account_type_id from ac.account_head a where account_type_id not in (0) And not exists (Select account_id from ac.account_head_hidden b where branch_id=:pbranch_id and a.account_id=b.account_id) order by account_head asc) ) a
